channel.title: How do I import my own samples?
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/jpegmafia/puff-daddy
Ive been figuring out how to make a telephone type of sound so I’m able to make better dnb tracks. Unfortunately im not able to import samples or anything like that
This song by Jpegmafia is a good example of what im trying to get
(Edit) Heres another example at around minute 2:25
https://youtu.be/_ZlWJ1bnbgY
